notes: Summary: Talya took off, and Annie tells "Daddy" that Talya's feelings about whatever she's doing are her own.

109.heading: Warbucks, Oliver.
109.title: "He Started Out Eccentric"
109.author: Leonard Starr.
notes: Summary: That a voice has sent Prof. Eon on a journey is a concern, still aging sometimes brings eccentricity; "Daddy" comments on tension between Annie and Talya.

110.heading: Warbucks, Oliver.
110.title: "Hearing Voices"
110.author: Leonard Starr.
notes: Summary: Annie tries to tell "Daddy" that Punjee and Talya have left; "Daddy" is on the telephone to the Warbucks Research Center, it seems a voice has told Prof. Ezra Eon to go somewhere.

111.heading: Warbucks, Oliver.
111.title: "Orderly Transfer of the Presidency of Kwaq"
111.author: Leonard Starr.
notes: Summary: It's going as planned, but "Daddy" has to excuse himself.

112.heading: Warbucks, Oliver.
112.title: "A Role in our Organization"
112.author: Leonard Starr.
notes: Summary: "Daddy" is thinking Talya would make a good Chief of Security, but Annie tells him Talya is gone.

113.heading: Warbucks Research Center.
113.title: "Hearing Voices"
113.author: Leonard Starr.
notes: Summary: Annie tries to tell "Daddy" that Punjee and Talya have left; "Daddy" is on the telephone to the Warbucks Research Center, it seems a voice has told Prof. Ezra Eon to go somewhere.
